sources.name: DataSetA
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DataSetA

sources.name: DataSetB
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  DataSetB

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared DataSetA = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://storaged2d2.blob.core.windows.net/capstone4roman/Dataset A.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared DataSetB = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://storaged2d2.blob.core.windows.net/capstone4roman/DatasetB.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Capitalized each word" = Table.TransformColumns(PromotedHeaders, {{"marital_status", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Capitalized each word", {{"ancestry", "Country"}}),
  #"Capitalized each word 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Renamed columns", {{"disease", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}})
in
  #"Capitalized each word 1";
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = DataSetA,
  #"Capitalized each word" = Table.TransformColumns(Source, {{"Emp_Status", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}}),
  #"Capitalized each word 1" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Capitalized each word", {{"Gender", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}}),
  #"Capitalized each word 2" = Table.TransformColumns(#"Capitalized each word 1", {{"Education", each Text.Proper(_), type nullable text}})
in
  #"Capitalized each word 2";
